alert.note: Alert for Johnson; Keokuk; Louisa; Washington (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS QuadCities (Eastern Iowa and Northwestern Illinois - Quad Cities)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 05 at 10:14PM CST by NWS QuadCities
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Louisa, east central Keokuk, southern Johnson and northern Washington Counties through 1045 PM CST... At 1014 PM CST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 8 miles south of Wellman, or 10 miles west of Washington, moving northeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Wellman around 1020 PM CST. Kalona and Richmond around 1030 PM CST. Other locations in the path of this storm include Riverside, Lone Tree and Hills. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
